summary: Only the most worthy of warriors can face the dangers that lurk in this massive arena. You can claim honor in battle near the Silent Moons camp.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a massive Colosseum outside of Whiterun near the Silent Moons camp. The arena is filled with hordes of undead warriors, including Draugr Deathlords. Above the arena is a spectator area which includes thrones for royal attendees. Furthermore, traps surround the large camp fire. Oil pools and bear traps are spread throughout the battlefield to either help or hinder you. Good luck...

-Comes complete with loading screens
-Adds two chests with healing potions

*Requires Dawnguard, Hearthfires and Dragonborn (I won't be able to change that)
author: GadgetmanZB
